EmailTemplate.name: ATS transfer to Orders
EmailTemplate.subject: ATS Case transfer to Orders
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your email requesting order support. To ensure your issue is resolved as quickly as possible, we forwarded your information to our order experts at orders@honeywell.com. An expert from that team will contact you very soon to resolve your question.
During the short wait, did you know you can access immediate support resources by accessing the Honeywell MyAerospace portal at www.aerospace.honeywell.com? Here you can also find technical videos, solutions to common questions and even information about your parts and repair orders.
For future order questions, feel free to contact the team at orders@honeywell.com. For other technical support requests, visit www.aerospace.honeywell.com.
